set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=termutils PACKAGE_VERSION=2.0
oegextract termutils
# Prefix is the install dir because it always installs into the prefix dir # and it should not install into the base dir in case it is not empty. # make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} also copies into the prefix dir. configure --prefix=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR} --bindir=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
mv bin bin64
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
